title: Bayes: the clergyman whose maths changed the world
description: Bayes’ Rule has been used in AI, genetic studies, translating foreign languages and even cracking the Enigma Code in the Second World War. We find out about Thomas Bayes - the 18th century English statistician and clergyman whose work was largely forgotten until the 20th century.
itunes:subtitle: How an obscure theory came into fashion.
